Title: Commit Guru: Analytics and Risk Prediction of Software Commits
Elements_risk_assessment:
Using the annotate/blame function of the SCM tool, we
can discover in what previous commits those lines of codes were
modified. These commits are then marked as a potential location
where the bug was introduced, i.e., potential risky commits.
Summary:
Commit Guru(language agnostic analytics and prediction tool that identifies and predicts risky software commits.) automatically identifies
    risky (i.e., bug-inducing) commits and builds a prediction model that assess the likelihood of a recent commit introducing a bug in the future.
Outcome:
They present a tool, Commit Guru, that performs
analytics and predicts risky software commits. Commit Guru uses
13 metrics introduced in a prior work [11] to give its analytics
and make its predictions.
